% A LaTex Template for generating Team Care Arrangements Item 721 for Australian General Practitioners
%% Do not edit unless you really know what you are doing.
\documentclass[english]{report}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[latin9]{inputenc}
\usepackage{multicol}
\usepackage{supertabular}
\usepackage{graphicx}
\usepackage[a4paper]{geometry}
\geometry{verbose,tmargin=0.5cm,bmargin=0.6cm,lmargin=0.5cm,rmargin=0.5cm}
\setcounter{secnumdepth}{3}
\setcounter{tocdepth}{3}
\setlength{\parskip}{\medskipamount}
\setlength{\parindent}{0pt}
\usepackage{array}
\makeatletter
\DeclareRobustCommand{\checkbox}{\framebox(5,5){$\bullet$}}
\DeclareRobustCommand{\emptycheckbox}{\framebox(5,5){}}
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% LyX specific LaTeX commands.
%% Because html converters don't know tabularnewline
\providecommand{\tabularnewline}{\\}

\makeatother

\usepackage{babel}

\begin{document}
\begin{tabular}{>{\raggedright}p{5.5cm}>{\centering}p{8cm}>{\raggedright}p{4cm}}
  \textbf{!clinic-name}\\
  !clinic-branch \\
  !clinic-street \\
  !clinic-suburb\\
  Phone:!clinic-phone\\
  Fax  :!clinic-fax
     & \textbf{!heading
      } &
 \textbf{!name} \\
 !street \\
 !suburb \\
 !birthdate !age\\
 !medicare !card-position\\
 !patient-phone
 !patient-mobile}
\\
\end{tabular}

!provider \\
Dear !fname-provider,\\\\
Thank you for seeing !firstname age !age. I have developed Team Care Arrangements for !firstname and !he-she has given consent to include you as a member of the team.  Below is a brief outline of my assessment and plan for on-going care including an outline of your role.\\
\hrule
\hrule 
\textbf{\underline {HEALTH ISSUES WHICH NEED YOUR INVOLVEMENT}}\\
%\textbf{Presenting Problem:}\\!health-issue\\
!health-issue\\
\textbf{Relevant History:}\\!relevant-history\\
\textbf{\underline {PLAN}}\\
\textbf{Needs Identified}\\!needs\\
\textbf{Goals}\\!goals\\
\textbf{Treatment Arrangements}\\
\begin{tabular}{>{\raggedright}p{6.0cm}>{\raggedright}p{6.0cm}>{\raggedright}p{6cm} }
!treatment-arrangements
\tabularnewline
\end{tabular}
!team-member-extra-notes
\hrule
\\
\textbf{Medications}\\\\
\begin{tabular}{>{\raggedright}p{7.5cm}>{\raggedright}p{3.0cm}>{\raggedright}p{4cm}> {\raggedright}p{3.5cm} }
!medications
\tabularnewline
\end{tabular}
\\

\begin{tabular}{>{\raggedright}p{7.0cm}>{\raggedright}p{8cm} }

	!habits-measurements
	\end{tabular}

    \begin{tabular}{lp}
	!family-history
	\end{tabular}
\end{tabular}

\textbf{Allergies:}\\
{\small !allergies
\hrule
\\\\
!additional-health-issues
\\
\hrule 
\begin{minipage}[t]{9cm}%
\textbf{Team Care Members Contact List}\\\\
\begin{tabular}{>{\raggedright}p{4cm}>{\raggedright}p{3cm}>{\raggedright}p{8cm} }
!team-care-members-contact-list
\end{tabular}
\end{minipage}
\\\\
\begin{minipage}[t]{9cm}%
\textbf{Other Providers Involved In Care}\\\\
\begin{tabular}{>{\raggedright}p{4cm}>{\raggedright}p{3cm}>{\raggedright}p{8cm} }
!other-providers-contact-list
\end{tabular}
\end{minipage}
\\\\
\hrule
\hrule
I would be grateful if you could let me know whether you are willing to be involved in the Team Care Arrangements for this patient and also whether you are satisfied with the plan or have any suggestions for changes to the Team Care Arrangements.  All you need to do is phone me or tick the appropriate box below and send your reply back to me.  \\\\
\textbf{Communication re: team care arrangement}\\
\emptycheckbox \text{{\footnotesize        I am willing to be involved in the Team Care Arrangements, and I am satisfied with the plan as it is.}}\\
\emptycheckbox{\footnotesize         I am willing to be involved in the Team Care Arrangements, and I would like to make some changes to the plan (please attach your suggested changes).}\\\\
\begin{tabular}{>{\raggedright}p{10cm}>{\raggedright}p{5cm} }
!team-care-member-signature
\end{tabular}
\\
\hrule
\hrule                                                                
\\\\\\
\text{Yours Sincerely}\\\\\\

!claimed-by-name %not practioner-name as when prepared need to annotate this <insert-when-claimed> and a nurse could prepare but can't claim

\end{document}
